function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to people not adhering to lockdown rules","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and potential for widespread outbreak","Mitigation":"Enforcement of lockdown rules, public education, and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, monitoring systems, and surveillance technology","People":"General public, essential workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and law enforcement"},{"Description":"Delay in infrastructure projects due to COVID-19 lockdown restrictions","Impact":"Disruption of project timelines, increased costs, and contractual implications","Mitigation":"Long-term and short-term crisis planning, health and safety risk assessments, and provision of personnel protective equipment","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and project management tools, digital collaboration platforms","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and contractors","Owner":"Infrastructure companies, project managers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction industry's supply chains and workforce","Impact":"Cost and schedule implications for infrastructure projects, potential supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Identification of critical suppliers, scenario analysis, clear communication, and contingency planning","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics, communication platforms","People":"Suppliers, contractors, and project stakeholders","Owner":"Project managers, procurement teams, and supply chain managers"}]}
